subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Blue Jays scored the go-ahead run in the seventh inning after shaky plays by Brian McCann, substituting for the injured Mark Teixeira at first, and second baseman Brian Roberts.
snippet: The Blue Jays scored the go-ahead run in the seventh inning after shaky plays by Brian McCann, substituting for the injured Mark Teixeira at first, and second baseman Brian Roberts.
